db:select.doc:name: Select Customer By ID
db:select.db:sql: SELECT ${db.database}.${tables.customers}.customerId, lastName, firstName, email, phone, userName, passwordHash, passwordSalt, checkingNumber, checkingBalance, savingNumber, savingBalance, loanNumber, loanBalance FROM ${tables.customers}, ${tables.credentials}, ${tables.accounts} WHERE ${db.database}.${tables.customers}.customerId = :custId AND ${db.database}.${tables.credentials}.customerId = :custId AND ${db.database}.${tables.accounts}.customerId = :custId

db:insert.doc:name: Insert New Customer
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO ${db.database}.${tables.customers} (lastName, firstName, email, phone) VALUES (:lastName, :firstName, :email, :phone)

db:insert.doc:name: Insert New Customer Credentials
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO ${db.database}.${tables.credentials} (customerId, userName, passwordSalt, passwordHash) VALUES (:customerId, :username, :salt, :hash)

db:bulk-insert.doc:name: Bulk insert
db:bulk-insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO ${db.database}.${tables.customers} (lastName, firstName, email, phone) VALUES (:lastName, :firstName, :email, :phone)

sub-flow.name: createAccountsByCustomerIdSubFlowOLD
sub-flow.doc:description: For a given customerId, creates a Checking, Saving, and Loan account in the customer_accounts and creates an opening balance transaction for each account in the customer_transactions table.

set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json var timeMillis = ((now() as Number {unit: "milliseconds"})/100000) as String import * from dw::core::Strings --- { checkingNumber: substringBefore("CHK" ++ timeMillis, "."), checkingBalance: 1000.0, savingNumber: substringBefore("SAV" ++ timeMillis, "."), savingBalance: 3000.0, loanNumber: substringBefore("LOA" ++ timeMillis, "."), loanBalance: -1000.0, }]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Customer Account Information

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Customer Accounts
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO ${db.database}.${tables.accounts} (customerId, checkingNumber, checkingBalance, savingNumber, savingBalance, loanNumber, loanBalance) VALUES (:custId, :checkingNumber, :checkingBalance, :savingNumber, :savingBalance, :loanNumber, :loanBalance)
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ custId: vars.customerId, checkingNumber: vars.accounts.checkingNumber, checkingBalance: vars.accounts.checkingBalance, savingNumber: vars.accounts.savingNumber, savingBalance: vars.accounts.savingBalance, loanNumber: vars.accounts.loanNumber, loanBalance: vars.accounts.loanBalance, }]

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { customerId: vars.customerId, accountNumber: vars.accounts.checkingNumber, transAmount: vars.accounts.checkingBalance, transDescription: "Opening balance" }]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Checking Opening Balance Transaction

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { customerId: vars.customerId, accountNumber: vars.accounts.savingNumber, transAmount: vars.accounts.savingBalance, transDescription: "Opening balance" }]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Saving Opening Balance Transaction

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { customerId: vars.customerId, accountNumber: vars.accounts.loanNumber, transAmount: vars.accounts.loanBalance, transDescription: "Opening balance" }]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Loan Opening Balance Transaction

set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/java var timeMillis = ((now() as Number {unit: "milliseconds"})/100000) as String import * from dw::core::Strings --- substringBefore(vars.acctPrefix ++ timeMillis, ".")]
set-variable.doc:name: Set accountNumber

set-variable.value: #[output application/java --- "INSERT INTO ${db.database}.${tables.accounts} (customerId, $(vars.accountFieldNames.accountNumber), $(vars.accountFieldNames.accountBalance)) VALUES ($(vars.customerId),'$(vars.accountNumber)',$(vars.accountBalance)) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE $(vars.accountFieldNames.accountNumber) = '$(vars.accountNumber)', $(vars.accountFieldNames.accountBalance) = $(vars.accountBalance)"]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Insert Account SQL

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { customerId: vars.customerId, accountNumber: vars.accountNumber, transAmount: vars.accountBalance, transDescription: vars.transDescription }]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Transaction Details

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Single Transaction
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO ${db.database}.${tables.transactions} (customerId, accountNumber, transAmount, transDescription) VALUES (:custId, :accnum, :amount, :desc)
